Package game.exceptions

package game.exceptions
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    BadDamageInPercentException
    This exception throws when attribute 'damageInPercent' < 0
    BadIntelligenceException
    This exception throws when attribute 'intelligence' <= 0
    BadInventoryCapacityException
    This exception throws when attribute 'capacity' < 0
    BadItemCharacteristicsFormatException
    This exception throws when some attributes of the Item class are incompatible data types
    BadMaxCountException
    This exception throws when attribute 'maxCount' < 0
    BadPlayerCharacteristicsFormatException
    This exception throws when some attributes of the Player class are incompatible data types
    BadRequiredOnesAmountException
    This exception throws when attribute 'requiredOnesAmount' <= 0
    BadRoomCharacteristicsFormatException
    This exception throws when some attributes of the RoomFactory class are incompatible data types
    BadRoomsAmountException
    This exception throws when attribute 'requiredOnesAmount' <= 0 or can't be generated, because of the bad random range
    BadRoomSizesException
    This exception throws when room size attribute <= 0 or can't be generated, because of the bad random range
    BadTeacherCharacteristicsFormatException
    This exception throws when some attributes of the Teacher class are incompatible data types
    BadWorldCharacteristicsFormatException
    This exception throws when some attributes of the WorldGenerator class are incompatible data types
